title: Can't purchase champ
body: I can't purchase any champions at 6300 with Ip but I can purchase the cheaper ones with ip. It only lets me be able to purchase the champions with rp witch i'm not going to do

replies.body:
It sounds like the IP balance that's currently being displayed to you may be outdated. I'd recommend purchasing one of the cheap *tier 2 runes* that cost very little IP. This should force a sync with the server and update your IP Balance.

Let me know if this helped. ^.^
